Headline: #31 31st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 31st/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Westbound 31 31st buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Shields and 31st: due to, street blockage near 31st/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #31 31st buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Shields and 31st: due to, street blockage near 31st/LaSalle.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
